title: Reading Planet
brief_description: A unique four part series, now on the one tape, designed to help students improve their reading and writing skills. An alien from the Reading Planet, Prism, transports five students into outer space where they discover that reading can be fun: The four programs on the videotape are: 1. “Turn on the TV in Your Head”, 2. “Escape from Lethargia”, 3. “Time Scrambler”, 4. “Hope of the Future”. Rated: G
